ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: it truly is a Noble Qur'an
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: That this is indeed the glorious Qur'an
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: that this indeed is a noble Qur'an,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: that this is an honorable Quran
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: This is indeed the noble Qur’an.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: That (this) is indeed an honorable recitation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Most surely it is an honored Quran,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: it is surely a noble Koran
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: That (this) is indeed a noble Qur'an
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: that this is indeed a noble Quran,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: That it is a Recitation honourable.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: This is indeed a noble Quran,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: That this is indeed a qur'an Most Honourable,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: That (this) is indeed an honourable recital (the Noble Quran).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: it is indeed a Glorious Koran,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, it is a noble Qur'an
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:77] This, namely, what is being recited to you, is indeed a noble Qur’ān,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (That (this) is indeed a noble Qur'an) a noble and bounteous Qur'an
